title: Growing Corn Basics Time Lapse - 6 days

tasks.task: Drive a John Deere 6600 tractor at a slow speed (6.0-6.8 KPH) while operating the Quickirector system to turn grapevines.
subtasks: Sit in the John Deere 6600 tractor seat.
Operate the steering wheel to control direction while driving.
Adjust speed by managing the throttle.
Engage/disengage the Quickirector system as needed.
Monitor the turning of grapevines using the Quickirector system.
Align the grapevines as the tractor moves at a slow pace.

tasks.task: Operate a Quickirector system.
subtasks: Align the machine's guide to track the grapevines.
Use control mechanisms to maintain proper alignment with the vines.

tasks.task: Manual labor to trim or manage grapevines.
subtasks: Crouch or bend to reach low-hanging grapes or vines.
Use pruning shears or tools to trim grapevines.
Position oneself near the base of the grapevines while working.

tasks.task: Load and unload equipment from the tractor.
subtasks: Enter the John Deere 6600 tractor to load/unload tools.
Operate the rear drawbar or other attachment to attach/detach equipment.
Lift or handle equipment to secure it in place on the tractor.
Exit the tractor after loading/unloading.

tasks.task: Check and maintain the condition of the grapevines.
subtasks: Walk through rows of grapevines to inspect their health.
Look for signs of disease, pests, or damage on the vines.
弯腰 to check the base of the vines for weeds or debris.
Assess the overall growth and development of the grapevines.

tasks.task: Apply fertilizer or pesticides to the grapevines.
subtasks: Mix the solution in a spraying unit.
Drive the tractor through the rows, releasing the solution onto the vines.
Monitor the application pattern to ensure even coverage.
Adjust the spraying system as needed during application.

tasks.task: Tend to the irrigation system.
subtasks: Check water levels in the reservoir or pump.
Adjust valves or controllers to direct water flow to the vines.
Monitor the sprinkler or irrigation system's operation.
Check for leaks or clogs in the irrigation lines.
